heading: Research
description: Using a Swot analysis, we’ll evaluate your best performing competitors’ strategies. We’ll then use this to ascertain how to take advantage of their strengths and weaknesses.

detail.title: UX research
detail.des: This is the launchpad for every project. Here, we analyze your current product, competitors, and target market. We then bring all these strands together to create a site map and a list of UX features that can be actioned.
detail.deliverables: Site map . Key findings for UX improvements . SWOT analysis

detail.title: UX strategy
detail.des: The scope of a UX strategy ranges from a single product, service, or feature, to multiple products and services. A string strategy ensures that user-centered insights are integrated into a business plan.
detail.deliverables: Plan of action designed to deliver improved UX over an established timeframe.

heading: Experience design
description: Turn the results of the analysis into user-friendly pages and blocks that comply with generally accepted rules of usability and convert visitors into customers.

detail.title: Wireframes
detail.des: This stage helps us understand the logic and structure of the future service. We create and approve prototypes for every single flow.
detail.deliverables: Our UX/ UI design agency excels in crafting and approving wireframe prototypes for a thorough understanding of future service logic and structure.

detail.title: Clickable prototypes
detail.des: using a clickable prototype, we can demonstrate and test how the website will actually behave under near-realistic conditions.
detail.deliverables: Plan of action designed to deliver improved UX over an established timeframe.

heading: Interface design
description: It is the part where the magic begins. We start with the mood board and design conception for the future design. After this, we create the UI design for the whole project and make a UI kit or Design system for developers.

detail.title: Moodboard
detail.des: To determine the visual direction and style of the interface, our team creates mood boards and coordinates them with the client. This allows you to choose the most suitable solution at the earliest stages and avoid throwing multiple improvements at the design stage when cardinal changes in direction take a lot of time.
detail.deliverables: Moodboard to choose the suitable visual direction.

detail.title: Design Conception
detail.des: Based on the research and the direction chosen in the moodboards, we create the first visual concept of the site to demonstrate the chosen style in real conditions before creating the finished UI design.
detail.deliverables: The design concept that helps to establish the visual direction.

detail.title: Mockup design
detail.des: Collecting all previous work, we proceed to craft the actual UI design, incorporating aesthetic and graphic elements such as illustrations and motion. These elements, soon to be brought to life, are systematically validated with customers step by step.

detail.title: Delivery
detail.des: After creating the UI design for the entire project, we develop a UI kit for developers and prepare to implement and bring the project to life.
detail.deliverables: Handoff file for development with UI-kit

heading: Development
description: The development team is always in touch with the designers, which allows us to prevent many possible problems in advance and promptly close existing issues.

detail.title: No-code development
detail.des: Discover an easily implementable, highly optimized solution to launch your website quickly or create an MVP version of your product with minimal resource investment.

detail.title: Web App development
detail.des: In custom code, there are no facets of what is possible if the implementation contains business value. We help to find unique custom solutions and offer simpler, yet equally effective ways thanks to our experience.

detail.title: Mobile app development
detail.des: We offer cross-platform mobile development services to build high-quality, feature-rich apps that work seamlessly. We guarante experienced team, custom solutions, user-friendly design, and comprehensive testing.
